alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Boone; Callaway; Moniteau; Monroe; Shelby (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 12:46PM CDT until July 29 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Boone County in central Missouri... Western Audrain County in central Missouri... Shelby County in northeastern Missouri... Western Callaway County in central Missouri... Monroe County in northeastern Missouri... Northeastern Moniteau County in central Missouri... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1246 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Salisbury to 7 miles west of New Franklin, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Rocheport around 105 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Midway, Columbia, Sturgeon, Madison, Hallsville, Centralia and Murry. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 115 and 148. This also includes Rock Bridge State Park, Finger Lakes State Park, Union Covered Bridge Historic Site, and Jewell Cemetery Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Audrain; Boone; Callaway; Moniteau; Monroe; Shelby
